name: Notification of Cancellation of Service/Resource on Appointment
description: Notification sent when a service or resource is cancelled from an existing appointment
businessPurpose: Notify systems when services or resources are cancelled from appointments to free up resources and prevent conflicts
timing: Sent when a service or resource needs to be cancelled from an existing appointment
realWorldScenarios: Anesthesia cancelled when procedure changed to local anesthesia only
Interpreter services cancelled when family member can translate
Specialized equipment cancelled when standard equipment sufficient
Additional nursing support cancelled when patient acuity decreased
Transport services cancelled when patient able to ambulate
Dietary consultation cancelled when patient NPO status changed

generationRules.AIG: Resource group cancellation details if applicable
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - accurate service/resource cancellation frees up resources and prevents scheduling conflicts
